question: Display journalists and editors with English language proficiency.
sql_query1:
SELECT Journalists.name
FROM Journalists
WHERE Journalists.language_proficiency = "English"
UNION
SELECT Editors.name
FROM Editors
WHERE Editors.language_proficiency = "English"
sql_query2:
SELECT Journalists.name
FROM Journalists
UNION
SELECT Editors.name
FROM Editors
WHERE Editors.language_proficiency = "English"
interpretation1: Can you show both journalists and editors who have English language proficiency?
interpretation2: List all journalists and also show editors with English language proficiency.
